mapper.sql: id as id, present_date as presentDate, po_money as poMoney, po_user_count as poUserCount, po_money_max as poMoneyMax, po_money_min as poMoneyMin, deduct_money as deductMoney, deduct_user_count as deductUserCount, deduct_money_min as deductMoneyMin, deduct_money_max as deductMoneyMax, electric_money as electricMoney, electric_user_count as electricUserCount, electric_money_max as electricMoneyMax, electric_money_min as electricMoneyMin, creator_id as creatorId, creator_name as creatorName, create_time as createTime, last_modifier_id as lastModifierId, last_modifier_name as lastModifierName, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, is_delete as isDelete
mapper.insert: insert into drt_monitor_fund_day (id, present_date, po_money, po_user_count, po_money_max, po_money_min, deduct_money, deduct_user_count, deduct_money_min, deduct_money_max, electric_money, electric_user_count, electric_money_max, electric_money_min, creator_id, creator_name, create_time, last_modifier_id, last_modifier_name, last_modify_time, is_delete) values (#{id}, #{presentDate}, #{poMoney}, #{poUserCount}, #{poMoneyMax}, #{poMoneyMin}, #{deductMoney}, #{deductUserCount}, #{deductMoneyMin}, #{deductMoneyMax}, #{electricMoney}, #{electricUserCount}, #{electricMoneyMax}, #{electricMoneyMin}, #{creatorId}, #{creatorName}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifierId}, #{lastModifierName}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{isDelete})
